## MatchFunction type

Match function type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MatchFunction<TBaseElement> = {
    <T, TElement extends TBaseElement>(reactive: Reactive<T>, matcher: (value: T) => RefSpec<TElement> | null): RefSpec<TElement>;
};
```
**References:** [Reactive](../../signals/reactive/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../../view/refspec/)
